languages.text: {n}Идира вскрикивает и начинает слепо щупать руками воздух перед собой и нервно тереть глаза.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Грокс{/g} мне на голову, какого черта?! Лорд-капитан, я... я ничего не вижу! Только мрак, беспросветный мрак".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира вскрикивает и начинает слепо щупать руками воздух перед собой и нервно тереть глаза.{/n} "Грокс мне на голову, какого черта?! Лорд-капитан, я… я ничего не вижу! Только мрак, беспросветный мрак".

languages.text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира вскрикивает и начинает слепо щупать руками воздух перед собой и нервно тереть глаза.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Грокс{/g} мне на голову, какого черта?! Лорд-капитан, я... я ничего не вижу! Только мрак, беспросветный мрак".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly feels the air in front of her with her hands. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxsakes{/g}! What the hells? Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch darkness."

{n}Idira shrieks and blindly feels the air in front of her with her hands. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for groxsakes! What the hell? Lord Captain, I— I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch darkness."

{n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}'s sakes! What the hells? Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch black darkness."

{n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}'s sakes! What the hells? Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch black darkness."

{n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the hells? Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

{n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the hells? Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

{n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

languages.text: {n}Idira kreischt und schlägt blind in die Luft vor sich. Sie reibt sich nervös die Augen.{/n} "Ach, so eine {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groxscheiße{/g}! Was zum ... Lord Captain, ich ... ich kann nichts sehen! Nur Dunkelheit. Pechschwarze Dunkelheit."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira kreischt und schlägt blind in die Luft vor sich. Sie reibt sich nervös die Augen.{/n} "Ach, so eine {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groxscheiße{/g}! Was in allen Höllen? Lord Captain, ich ... ich kann nichts sehen! Nur Dunkelheit. Pechschwarze Dunkelheit."

languages.text: {n}Idira pousse un cri et se met à agiter les mains au hasard devant elle. Elle se frotte les yeux nerveusement.{/n} « Oh, nom d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} ! Qu'est-ce que... {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je... je vois plus rien ! Tout est noir. Y a plus que les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira pousse un cri et se met à agiter les mains au hasard devant elle. Elle se frotte les yeux nerveusement.{/n} « Oh, nom d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} ! Qu'est-ce qui m'arrive ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je... Je vois plus rien ! Tout est noir. Y a plus que les ténèbres. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉发出一声尖叫，双手疯狂地抓着空气，随后她紧张地揉着眼睛。{/n}“噢，该死的{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}！这是什么鬼东西……舰长大人，我……我什么也看不见！我眼前只有黑暗。无边无际的黑暗。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉发出一声尖叫，双手疯狂地抓着空气，随后她紧张地揉着眼睛。{/n}“噢，{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}啊！这是什么鬼东西？舰长大人，我……我什么也看不见！我眼前只有黑暗。无边无际的黑暗。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは悲鳴を上げ、やみくもに空中で目の前に手を伸ばす。彼女は不安そうに目をこすった。{/n}「ああ、いい加減にしてよ！一体何？ロード・キャプテン、私…何も見えないわ！暗闇しかない。漆黒の闇だわ」{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは悲鳴を上げ、やみくもに空中で目の前に手を伸ばす。彼女は不安そうに目をこすった。{/n}「ああ、{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}いい加減にしてよ{/g}！一体何？ロード・キャプテン、私…何も見えないわ！暗闇しかない。漆黒の闇だわ」

languages.text: {n}Idira chilla y coge a ciegas el aire que tiene delante. Se frota los ojos nerviosamente.{/n} «¡Oh, por el amor de un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}! ¿Qué...? ¡Lord Capitán! ¡No puedo ver nada! Solo oscuridad. Oscuridad absoluta».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira chilla y coge a ciegas el aire que tiene delante. Se frota los ojos nerviosamente.{/n} «¡Oh, por el amor de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}! ¿Qué demonios? ¡Lord Capitán! ¡No puedo ver nada! Solo oscuridad. Oscuridad absoluta».

languages.text: {n}İdira çığlık atıyor ve önündeki boşluğa körlemesine elini uzatıyor. Gergince gözlerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groks{/g} aşkına! Bu ne ya? Lord Kaptan... Hiçbir şey göremiyorum! Her yer karanlık. Kapkaranlık."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrieks and blindly reaches for the air in front of her. She rubs her eyes nervously.{/n} "Oh for {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sake! What the... Lord Captain, I... I can't see a thing! Only darkness. Pitch-black darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira çığlık atıyor ve önündeki boşluğa körlemesine elini uzatıyor. Gergince gözlerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groks{/g} aşkına! Bu ne ya? Lord Kaptan... Hiçbir şey göremiyorum! Her yer karanlık. Kapkaranlık."
